channel.title: Homes on Mircea Lungu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Mircea Lungu

item.description: I am actively recruiting students for the [projects listed below](#projects). If you have other project ideas that are related to my research interests contact me. -- Bio Mircea Lungu is associate professor in the Computer Science department of ITU. Before moving to Denmark he was assistant professor in Computer Science at the Faculty of Science and Engineering of University of Groningen where he was a member of the SEARCH team and also me in the DSSC pioneers group.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I am currently teaching or co-teaching the following courses at ITU: Software Architecture, with K. Manikas, Fall 2018, Spring 2019, Spring 2020 Advanced Software Engineering, with Y. Dittrich, M. Passivaara, P. Tell, H. Pfeiffer, Fall 2019 Technical Interaction Design, Fall 2019 In the past I have been involved in teaching a wide variety of computer science courses, including: Concurrent Programming, UI Design, Compiler Construction, Introduction to Data Science, Software Engineering.
